reviews.author: Restaurant Guru User
reviews.text: Tasty ice cream, croissants and cannoli. Great iced coffee, cappuccino and iced latte.

reviews.author: Nicelocal User
reviews.text: 100% natural, vegan, lactose & gluten-free ice cream in Berlin Prenzlauer Berg

reviews.author: Google Maps User
reviews.text: Delicious artisanal gelato with authentic Italian flavors. The quality is outstanding!
